name: Arcticade
description:
Arcticade is a 2D arctic-themed typing game. Players can practice and challenge themselves by typing as many words as possible to achieve the highest score.

Peanut the Penguin
Play as Peanut the Penguin and compete against the birds!

Arctic Practice
Practice arctic words in a chill environment.

Challenge Yourself
Challenge yourself and type as many words as you can!
